pkgmetadata.longdescription: Modelling anthropogenic deforestation // phcfM is an R package for modelling anthropogenic deforestation. It was initially developed to obtain REDD+ baseline scenarios of deforestation for the "programme holistique de conservation des forets a Madagascar" (from which the package is named after). Parameter inference is done in a hierarchical Bayesian framework. Markov chains Monte Carlo (MCMC) are coded in C++ using the Scythe statistical library to maximize computation efficiency.
